titleStmt.title: Yet one warning more to thee, O England together with a very tender lamentation with bowels of compassion & mourning yet over thee, O land ... / a prisoner I am in Worcester City-Gaol this 9th month the 16th day, and of the year accounted 1660 D.B.
titleStmt.author: D. B. (Daniel Baker), fl. 1650-1660.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
